summary.para: Sets the active text service for a specific language.

param.name: rclsid
param.para: Contains the CLSID of the text service to make active.

param.name: langid
param.para: Contains a LANGID value that specifies which language to set the default profile for. This method fails if this is not the currently active language.

param.name: guidProfiles
param.para: Contains a GUID value that identifies the language profile to make active.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: One or more parameters are invalid.
No thread manager has been created for the calling thread.

summary.para: Creates a language profile that consists of a specific text service and a specific language identifier.

param.name: rclsid
param.para: Contains the text service CLSID.

param.name: langid
param.para: Contains a LANGID value that specifies the language identifier of the profile that the text service is added to. If this contains -1, the text service is added to all languages.

param.name: guidProfile
param.para: Contains a GUID value that identifies the language profile. This is the value obtained by when the profile is active.

param.name: pchDesc
param.para: Pointer to a WCHAR buffer that contains the description string for the text service in the profile. This is the text service name displayed in the language bar.

param.name: cchDesc
param.para: Contains the length, in characters, of the description string in pchDesc. If this contains -1, pchDesc is assumed to be a NULL-terminated string.

param.name: pchIconFile
param.para: Pointer to a WCHAR buffer that contains the path and file name of the file that contains the icon to be displayed in the language bar for the text service in the profile. This file can be an executable (.exe), DLL (.dll) or icon (.ico) file.
This parameter is optional and can be NULL. In this case, a default icon is displayed for the text service.

param.name: cchFile
param.para: Contains the length, in characters, of the icon file string in pchIconFile. If this contains -1, pchIconFile is assumed to be a NULL-terminated string. This parameter is ignored if pchIconFile is NULL.

param.name: uIconIndex
param.para: Contains the zero-based index of the icon in pchIconFile to be displayed in the language bar for the text service in the profile. This parameter is ignored if pchIconFile is NULL.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

param.name: langid
param.para: Contains the LANGID of the language to make active.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

item.description: langid is an invalid language identifier.

description.para: No thread manager was created for the calling thread.

summary.para: Enables or disables a language profile for the current user.

param.name: rclsid
param.para: Contains the CLSID of the text service of the profile to be enabled or disabled.

param.name: langid
param.para: Contains a LANGID value that specifies the language of the profile to be enabled or disabled.

param.name: guidProfile
param.para: Contains a GUID value that identifies the profile to be enabled or disabled.

param.name: fEnable
param.para: Contains a BOOL value that specifies if the profile will be enabled or disabled. If this contains a nonzero value, the profile will be enabled. If this contains zero, the profile will be disabled.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

summary.para: Enables or disables a language profile by default for all users.

param.name: rclsid
param.para: Contains the CLSID of the text service of the profile to be enabled or disabled.

param.name: langid
param.para: Contains a LANGID value that specifies the language of the profile to be enabled or disabled.

param.name: guidProfile
param.para: Contains a GUID value that identifies the profile to be enabled or disabled.

param.name: fEnable
param.para: Contains a BOOL value that specifies if the profile is enabled or disabled. If this contains a nonzero value, the profile is enabled. If this contains zero, the profile is disabled.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

summary.para: Obtains an enumerator that contains the class identifiers of all registered text services.

param.name: ppEnum
param.para: Pointer to an IEnumGUID interface pointer that receives the enumerator object. The enumerator contains the CLSID for each registered text service. The caller must release this object when it is no longer required.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

summary.para: Obtains an enumerator that contains all of the profiles for a specific language.

param.name: langid
param.para: Contains a LANGID value that specifies the language to obtain an enumerator for.

param.name: ppEnum
param.para: Pointer to an interface pointer that receives the enumerator object.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: No corresponding language profile was found in the operating system. -or- An unspecified error occurred.

summary.para: Obtains the identifier of the currently active language profile for a specific text service.

param.name: rclsid
param.para: Contains the text service CLSID.

param.name: plangid
param.para: Pointer to a LANGID value that receives the active profile language identifier.

param.name: pguidProfile
param.para: Pointer to a GUID value that receives the language profile identifier. This is the value specified in when the profile was added.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The text service identified by rclsid is not currently active. pguidProfile receives GUID_NULL.
One or more parameters are invalid.

summary.para: Obtains the identifier of the currently active language.

param.name: plangid
param.para: Pointer to a LANGID value that receives the language identifier of the currently active language.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

summary.para: Obtains the default profile for a specific language.

param.name: langid
param.para: Contains a LANGID value that specifies which language to obtain the default profile for.

param.name: catid
param.para: Contains a GUID value that identifies the category that the text service is registered under. This can be a user-defined category or one of the predefined category values.

param.name: pclsid
param.para: Pointer to a CLSID value that receives the class identifier of the default text service for the language.

param.name: pguidProfile
param.para: Pointer to a GUID value that receives the identifier of the default profile for the language.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: No default language profile was found for the specified language and category.
One or more parameters are invalid.

summary.para: Obtains a list of the installed languages.

param.name: ppLangId
param.para: Pointer to a LANGID pointer that receives the array of identifiers of the currently installed languages. The number of identifiers placed in this array is supplied in pulCount. The array is allocated by this method. The caller must free this memory when it is no longer required using .

param.name: pulCount
param.para: Pointer to a ULONG value the receives the number of identifiers placed in the array at ppLangId.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: One or more parameters are invalid.

summary.para: Obtains the description string for a language profile.

param.name: rclsid
param.para: Contains the CLSID of the text service to obtain the profile description for.

param.name: langid
param.para: Contains a LANGID value that specifies which language to obtain the profile description for.

param.name: guidProfile
param.para: Contains a GUID value that identifies the language to obtain the profile description for.

param.name: pbstrProfile
param.para: Pointer to a BSTR value that receives the description string. The caller is responsible for freeing this memory using SysFreeString when it is no longer required.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

summary.para: Determines if a specific language profile is enabled or disabled.

param.name: rclsid
param.para: Contains the CLSID of the text service of the profile in question.

param.name: langid
param.para: Contains a LANGID value that specifies the language of the profile in question.

param.name: guidProfile
param.para: Contains a GUID value that identifies the profile in question.

param.name: pfEnable
param.para: Pointer to a BOOL value that receives a value that specifies if the profile is enabled or disabled. If this receives a nonzero value, the profile is enabled. If this receives zero, the profile is disabled.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

summary.para: Adds a text service to Text Services Foundation (TSF).

param.name: rclsid
param.para: Contains the CLSID of the text service to register.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

param.name: rclsid
param.para: Contains the text service CLSID.

param.name: langid
param.para: Contains a LANGID value that specifies the language identifier of the profile.

param.name: guidProfile
param.para: Contains a GUID value that identifies the language profile. This is the value specified in when the profile was added.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

summary.para: Sets the default profile for a specific language.

param.name: langid
param.para: Contains a LANGID value that specifies which language to set the default profile for.

param.name: rclsid
param.para: Contains the CLSID of the text service that will be the default for the language.

param.name: guidProfiles
param.para: Contains a GUID value that identifies the language profile that will be the default.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: One or more parameters are invalid.

summary.para: Sets a substitute keyboard layout for the specified language profile.

param.name: rclsid
param.para: Contains the CLSID of the text service of the profile in question.

param.name: langid
param.para: Contains a LANGID value that specifies the language of the profile in question.

param.name: guidProfile
param.para: Contains a GUID value that identifies the profile in question.

param.name: hKL
param.para: Contains an HKL value that specifies the input locale identifier for the substitute keyboard. Obtain this value by calling .

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

summary.para: Removes a text service from TSF.

param.name: rclsid
param.para: Contains the text service CLSID to unregister.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

summary.para: The ITfInputProcessorProfiles interface is implemented by the TSF manager and used by an application or text service to manipulate the language profile of one or more text services.

remarks.para: To obtain a pointer to this interface, call with CLSID_TF_InputProcessorProfiles.
